title: Connection issues
body:
Has anyone else been disconnecting for short period of about 15 seconds every 10 minutes or so? I know its not my internet since my discord and such would keep running. If anyone knows what the problem is, could you tell me how to fix it?

thanks

replies.body: It's not entirely uncommon to be able to access certain servers and not others, which seems to be the case here. Your network is simply having issues communicating with our servers, possibly due to how you've got your network configured. Check up on some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) paying attention to port forwarding and how to configure your DNS, but let me know if none of that seems to help.
